item.title: Classified data likely to delay John Bolton’s trial until 2027

item.title: Rep. Eric Swalwell, staunch Trump critic, launches bid for California governor
item.description: In an announcement video, the Democratic congressman said he will focus on resistance to the president and making the state more affordable.
